what: 4. Set Up GitHub Actions for Automatic Website Deployment
title: Setting up GitHub and GitHub Pages for vigilaPeru
text: Create .github/workflows/pkgdown.yaml:
code: # Workflow derived from https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v2/examples # Need help debugging build failures? Start at https://github.com/r-lib/actions#where-to-find-help on:   push:     branches: [main, master]   pull_request:     branches: [main, master]   release:     types: [published]   workflow_dispatch:  name: pkgdown  jobs:   pkgdown:     runs-on: ubuntu-latest     # Only restrict concurrency for non-PR jobs     concurrency:       group: pkgdown-${{ github.event_name != 'pull_request' || github.run_id }}     env:       GITHUB_PAT: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}     permissions:       contents: write     steps:       - uses: actions/checkout@v4        - uses: r-lib/actions/setup-pandoc@v2        - uses: r-lib/actions/setup-r@v2         with:           use-public-rspm: true        - uses: r-lib/actions/setup-r-dependencies@v2         with:           extra-packages: any::pkgdown, local::.           needs: website        - name: Build site         run: pkgdown::build_site_github_pages(new_process = FALSE, install = FALSE)         shell: Rscript {0}        - name: Deploy to GitHub pages üöÄ         if: github.event_name != 'pull_request'         uses: JamesIves/github-pages-deploy-action@v4.5.0         with:           clean: false           branch: gh-pages           folder: docs

title: Agregaci r de datos epidemiol / Fast aggregation of epidemiological data ‚Äî vp_aggregate
text: data data.table o data.frame con datos epidemiol. / data.table data.frame epidemiological data. Vector de caracteres o lista con variables de agrupaci. / Character vector list grouping variables. summarize Lista con funciones de resumen aplicar. / List summary functions apply. cases_col Nombre de la columna de casos (por defecto busca autom). / Name cases column (default searches automatically). as_tibble L. Si TRUE (predeterminado), devuelve un tibble. / Logical. TRUE (default), returns tibble. na.rm L. Si TRUE, elimina valores NA en c. / Logical. TRUE, removes NA values calculations.
